name: Baby Bee
description: Guide Baby Bee on a quest to get all the flowers with the minimum effort. Simple mechanics, complex puzzles. Think hard!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz (SSE2) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD4850 -OR- GeForce GTX 295 Storage: 190 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse needed, Windowed
